explains: n. 牧场，牧草地；生活状况，个人发展的机遇
v. 放牧；（牛、羊等）在草地上吃草
【名】 （Pasture）（英）帕斯彻，（法）帕斯蒂尔（人名）
wordGroup: put out to pasture 放牧

sentences.en: The cows are out now, grazing in the pasture.
sentences.cn: 牛群现在出去了，正在牧场上吃草。

sentences.en: It was absolutely essential to separate crops from the areas that animals used as pasture.
sentences.cn: 把庄稼与牲畜的放牧区分开至关重要。

sentences.en: Sheep will graze in their own pasture.
sentences.cn: 羊将在自己的草场吃草。
